title: 03/17/22 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 03/17/22 DPS Best Of
description:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Ray Allen about his reunion with KG and Paul Pierce at the Celtics game. NFL insider Ian Rapoport shares the latest on Deshaun Watson. And Super Bowl winning Offensive Lineman Andrew Witworth tells us when he decided he was going to retire.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
